statements: DELETE FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE id = 5 AND recycling_bin = TRUE;
DELETE FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND weight > 10.5;
DELETE FROM recycling_center WHERE center_name = 'ABC Recycling Center';
DELETE FROM RecyclableItems WHERE bin_id = 2 AND is_recyclable = true;
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalLogs WHERE log_id = 100 AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RecyclableItems WHERE is_recyclable = TRUE AND bin_id = 50;
DELETE FROM waste_pickup_schedule WHERE pickup_day = 'Monday' AND schedule_id = 2;
DELETE FROM WasteTypes WHERE is_recyclable = TRUE
